name: Abyssinia Restaurant
address: Abyssinia Restaurant, 7546 Edmonds St, Burnaby, BC V3N 1B4, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Meat and Veggie Combo
hasMenuItem.description: A combination of veggie and meat(beef)

hasMenuItem.name: Vegetarian Platter
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. A combination of split peas, lentil, chickpeas, cabbage, collard green, and vegetables. Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness and especially if you have certain medical conditions.

hasMenuItem.name: Doro Wot
hasMenuItem.description: A hearty spicy stew made from fresh chicken and sautéed red onions. Seasoned with chili pepper and flavored with garlic, ginger, and various Ethiopian herbs. Doro wot has a boiled eggs in it. Signature of Ethiopia.

hasMenuItem.name: Quanta Firfir
hasMenuItem.description: Strips of beef served with extra spicy berbere or awaze mixed with enjera

hasMenuItem.name: Doro Tibbs
hasMenuItem.description: Chicken breast pieces Sautéed with spiced butter, garlic, green pepper, and served with Enjera.

hasMenuItem.name: Yemisir Kik Wat
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Steamed peas with onion, seasoned with garlic, and ginger. Served with injera. Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness and especially if you have certain medical conditions.

hasMenuItem.name: Rice with Vegetarian Platter
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness and especially if you have certain medical conditions.

hasMenuItem.name: Kitfo regular /Row or cooked
hasMenuItem.description: Freshly minced very lean beef mixed with mitmita and butter.Kitfo is traditionally served like steak tarter or very rare.you can choose either you want it raw,half cooked on fully cooked.

hasMenuItem.description: Beef marinated in a special blend of spices and herbs.

hasMenuItem.name: Enqulal Firfir

hasMenuItem.name: Soft drinks
hasMenuItem.description: Canned soda; selection includes Coca-Cola, Diet Coca-Cola, Ginger Ale, Sprite.

hasMenuItem.name: Juice
hasMenuItem.description: Freshly squeezed juice available in apple, mango, or orange flavors.

hasMenuItem.name: Stella (330 ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Stella Artois, a 330ml serving, is a premium lager known for its rich heritage and noble traditions, offering a distinct and full taste crafted with the finest barley and hops.

hasMenuItem.name: Black label (1.75 liters)
hasMenuItem.description: A distinguished spirit, known for its deep, complex flavor profile and smooth finish, typically enjoyed on its own or as part of a refined cocktail.

hasMenuItem.name: Budweiser
hasMenuItem.description: Classic American Lager, Smooth & Rich in Tradition

hasMenuItem.name: Hennessy (750 ml)
hasMenuItem.description: Hennessy, a 750 ml bottle of cognac, offers a rich blend of aged eaux-de-vie to deliver complex flavors with a smooth finish.

hasMenuItem.name: Ouza (750 ml)
hasMenuItem.description: A distilled beverage traditionally from Greece, often enjoyed as an aperitif, made from grapes and flavored with anise.

hasMenuItem.name: Corona
hasMenuItem.description: Crisp, Refreshing Mexican Lager with a Smooth Finish. Perfect with a Lime Wedge.

hasMenuItem.name: Heineken
hasMenuItem.description: Smooth, Refreshing Lager with a Mildly Bitter Finish. Enjoy Chilled.

review.reviewBody: Gored Gored, Quanta Firfir and combos are all very good.

I don't recommend this place for anyone, today I ordered Quanta Firfir and Yebere tibs and both are very bad, specially Quanta Firfir, the meat wasn't Quanta and no onions on it, I  was very mad and called them and the lady who answered the phone she didn't help me anything, when I told her the taste wasn't good she just laughed. Even I asked her if I can speak with someone's who can speak English or Amharic because she doesn't speak Amharic and her English is so poor.
I like the restaurant but today I am.not happy.I got pieces of Engera with the food I ordered ,not a full enter aone which is not good  .I will never ever buy again.
